Title: The Chinese Communist Party fully represents the progressive orientation of China's progressive culture
Designer: Beijing zhongtong shi'ao tuwen sheji zhongxin (北京中通世奥图文设计中心)
Publisher: Zhongguo huabao chubanshe (中国画报出版社)
Notes: From a series Propaganda posters to welcome, propagate, carry out the "Sixteenth Party Congress" (Yingjie, xuanchuan, guanche "shiliuda" xuanchuanhua - 《接，宣传，贯彻“十六大”宣传画).The tower is the 457 metres high Oriental Pearl TV Tower in Shanghai.
Tags: National Congress of the Chinese Communist Party
中国共产党全国代表大会
